\subsection{Detailed Description}
Simple error message routines for S\+DL. 

\subsection{Function Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{_s_d_l__error_8h_ac88e1aa404a8f94aaee4ad6b94547647}\label{_s_d_l__error_8h_ac88e1aa404a8f94aaee4ad6b94547647}} 
\index{SDL\_error.h@{SDL\_error.h}!SDL\_GetError@{SDL\_GetError}}
\index{SDL\_GetError@{SDL\_GetError}!SDL\_error.h@{SDL\_error.h}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{SDL\_GetError()}{SDL\_GetError()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily D\+E\+C\+L\+S\+P\+EC const char$\ast$ S\+D\+L\+C\+A\+LL S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Get\+Error (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{void}]{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Get the last error message that was set. 

S\+DL A\+PI functions may set error messages and then succeed, so you should only use the error value if a function fails.

This returns a pointer to a static buffer for convenience and should not be called by multiple threads simultaneously.

\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
a pointer to the last error message that was set 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{_s_d_l__error_8h_a41e9f4f81899e7a2755e8a3f6f2bf166}\label{_s_d_l__error_8h_a41e9f4f81899e7a2755e8a3f6f2bf166}} 
\index{SDL\_error.h@{SDL\_error.h}!SDL\_GetErrorMsg@{SDL\_GetErrorMsg}}
\index{SDL\_GetErrorMsg@{SDL\_GetErrorMsg}!SDL\_error.h@{SDL\_error.h}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{SDL\_GetErrorMsg()}{SDL\_GetErrorMsg()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily D\+E\+C\+L\+S\+P\+EC char$\ast$ S\+D\+L\+C\+A\+LL S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Get\+Error\+Msg (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{char $\ast$}]{errstr,  }\item[{int}]{maxlen }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Get the last error message that was set for the current thread. 

S\+DL A\+PI functions may set error messages and then succeed, so you should only use the error value if a function fails.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em errstr} & A buffer to fill with the last error message that was set for the current thread \\
\hline
{\em maxlen} & The size of the buffer pointed to by the errstr parameter\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
errstr 
\end{DoxyReturn}
